Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

AdditionalVersions.longDescription: This type shall contain additional versions.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BootParameters.description: The version of the configuration file that contains the initial boot parameters of this software, such as parameters for U-Boot.
BootParameters.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of the configuration file that contains the initial boot parameters of this software.

Bootloader.description: The bootloader version contained in this software, such as U-Boot or UEFI.
Bootloader.longDescription: This property shall contain the bootloader version contained in this software.

FactoryConfiguration.description: The version of the configuration that contains the factory default runtime configuration parameters of this software.
FactoryConfiguration.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of the configuration that contains the factory default runtime configuration parameters of this software.

Kernel.description: The kernel version contained in this software.
Kernel.longDescription: This property shall contain the kernel version contained in this software.  For strict POSIX software, the value shall contain the output of `uname -srm`.  For Microsoft Windows, the value shall contain the output of `ver`, from Command Prompt.

Microcode.description: The microcode version contained in this software, such as processor microcode.
Microcode.longDescription: This property shall contain the microcode version contained in this software.

OSDistribution.description: The operating system name of this software.
OSDistribution.longDescription: This property shall contain the operating system name of this software.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

MeasurementBlock.longDescription: This type shall describe a DSP0274-defined measurement block.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Measurement.description: The hexadecimal string representation of the numeric value of the DSP0274-defined 'Measurement' field of the measurement block.
Measurement.longDescription: This property shall contain the value of the hexadecimal string representation of the numeric value of the DSP0274-defined 'Measurement' field of the measurement block.

MeasurementIndex.description: The DSP0274-defined 'Index' field of the measurement block.
MeasurementIndex.longDescription: This property shall contain the value of the DSP0274-defined 'Index' field of the measurement block.

MeasurementSize.description: The DSP0274-defined 'MeasurementSize' field of the measurement block.
MeasurementSize.longDescription: This property shall contain the value of the DSP0274-defined 'MeasurementSize' field of the measurement block.

MeasurementSpecification.description: The DSP0274-defined 'MeasurementSpecification' field of the measurement block.
MeasurementSpecification.longDescription: This property shall contain the value of the DSP0274-defined 'MeasurementSpecification' field of the measurement block.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.Other: The Redfish service does not have enough data to make a determination about this release.
enumDescriptions.Production: This release is ready for use in production environments.
enumDescriptions.Prototype: This release is intended for development or internal use.

enumLongDescriptions.Other: This value shall indicate that the Redfish service cannot determine if this release is validated or prototype.
enumLongDescriptions.Production: This value shall indicate that the software is ready for use in production environments.
enumLongDescriptions.Prototype: This value shall indicate that the software is designed for development or internal use.

SoftwareInventory.description: The `SoftwareInventory` schema contains an inventory of software components.  This can include software components such as BIOS, BMC firmware, firmware for other devices, system drivers, or provider software.
SoftwareInventory.longDescription: This resource contains a single software component that this Redfish service manages.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AdditionalVersions.description: The additional versions of this software.
AdditionalVersions.longDescription: This property shall contain the additional versions of this software.

AssociatedPhysicalContext.description: The area or device to which the software applies.  Used to distinguish when different parts of a device have different software components.
AssociatedPhysicalContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the physical context for the software inventory data.

LowestSupportedVersion.description: The lowest supported version of this software.
LowestSupportedVersion.longDescription: This property shall represent the lowest supported version of this software.  This string is formatted using the same format used for the `Version` property.

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or producer of this software.
Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall represent the name of the manufacturer or producer of this software.

Measurement.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of the `ComponentIntegrity` resource.
Measurement.longDescription: This property shall contain a DSP0274-defined measurement block.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RelatedItem.description: An array of links to resources or objects that represent devices to which this software inventory applies.
RelatedItem.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources or objects that represent devices to which this software inventory applies.

ReleaseDate.description: The release date of this software.
ReleaseDate.longDescription: This property shall contain the date of release or production for this software.  If the time of day is unknown, the time of day portion of the property shall contain `00:00:00Z`.

ReleaseType.longDescription: This property shall describe the type of release for the software.

SoftwareId.description: The implementation-specific label that identifies this software.
SoftwareId.longDescription: This property shall represent an implementation-specific label that identifies this software.  This string correlates with a component repository or database.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

UefiDevicePaths.description: The list of UEFI device paths of the components associated with this software inventory item.
UefiDevicePaths.longDescription: This property shall contain a list UEFI device paths of the components associated with this software inventory item.  The UEFI device paths shall be formatted as defined by the UEFI Specification.

Updateable.description: An indication of whether the update service can update this software.
Updateable.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the update service can update this software.  If `true`, the service can update this software.  If `false`, the service cannot update this software and the software is for reporting purposes only.

Version.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of this software.

VersionScheme.longDescription: This property shall describe the scheme used to format the value of the `Version` property.

WriteProtected.description: Indicates if the software is write-protected.
WriteProtected.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the software image can be overwritten, where a value `true` shall indicate that the software cannot be altered or overwritten.

enumLongDescriptions.DotIntegerNotation: This value shall indicate that the value of the `Version` property contains a sequence of integers separated by period (dot) characters, and shall follow the pattern `^\d+(\.\d+)*$`.  Leading zeros in the sequence shall be ignored.
enumLongDescriptions.OEM: This value shall indicate that the value of the `Version` property follows a format and rules as defined by the vendor or manufacturer.
enumLongDescriptions.SemVer: This value shall indicate that the value of the `Version` property conforms to the format and rules of the Semantic Version 2.0 specification, and may include pre-release or build metadata.

title: #SoftwareInventory.v1_11_0.SoftwareInventory
